label: Fourth-Year Chinese II
description: Continuation of CHIN 440. 3 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHIN 440 or equivalent.
courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHIN 440 or equivalent.
classScheduleInformation: Prior knowledge of language requires a placement exam to be given. Call 244-1432 for date of exam and to register for the test.
